SCRIPT.MSCRI:
! -------------------------------Preparing arguments to connect to the server------------------ ! PYTHON FILE PATH : SET &UC4RB_CONNECT_CMD# = "java "
! JAVA OPTION : IF &UC4RB_OSB_JAVA_OPTIONS# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_CONNECT_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CONNECT_CMD#, &UC4RB_OSB_JAVA_OPTIONS#) : ENDIF
: SET &UC4RB_CONNECT_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CONNECT_CMD#, " weblogic.WLST ""&PYTHON_FILE#""")
! PREPARE URL : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_OSB_HOST_NAME# : SET &URL# = "&UC4RB_OSB_PROTOCOL#://&UC4RB_OSB_ESC_VALUE#:&UC4RB_OSB_PORT#"
: SET &UC4RB_CONNECT_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CONNECT_CMD#, ' "&URL#"')
! USERNAME : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_OSB_USERNAME# : SET &UC4RB_CONNECT_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CONNECT_CMD#, ' "&UC4RB_OSB_ESC_VALUE#"')
! DECRYPT PASSWORD : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_OSB_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
: SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" : SET &UC4RB_CONNECT_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CONNECT_CMD#, ' "%UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD%"') : CASE "UNIX" : SET &UC4RB_CONNECT_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CONNECT_CMD#, ' "$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD"') : OTHER : ENDSWITCH !Connection Time Out : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PRV.INCLUDE.LOAD_PCK_PARAMETERS : SET &UC4RB_CONNECT_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CONNECT_CMD#, ' "&UC4RB_OSB_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT#"')

DOCU_Docu.DOC: This include is used to build the java command for connecting to OSB server as per the specified inputs.
